definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Automatic modification of the index register.
sentences.chinese: 自動修改變址寄存器內容。

sentences.english: The same logic used to load the register is used to enable the tri-state buffers instead.
sentences.chinese: 裝載寄存器的邏輯同樣用於使能三態緩衝器。

sentences.english: This register contains a value that indicates the partition to which the processor is assigned.
sentences.chinese: 這個寄存器包含一個說明爲該分區分配的處理器的值。

sentences.english: The most obvious example of this is a hardware status register.
sentences.chinese: 最明顯的例子，這是一個硬體狀態寄存器。

sentences.english: Setup all the specific registers with LBA address.
sentences.chinese: 用LBA地址設置所有的特殊功能寄存器。

sentences.english: In protected mode, which register references the descriptor for the stack segment?
sentences.chinese: 在保護模式下，哪個寄存器引用棧段描述符。
抗輻射8位的移位寄存器。

sentences.english: With a power-on reset functions, namely, the DAC registers reset to all zeroes.
sentences.chinese: 帶有上電覆位功能，即把DAC寄存器復位至全零。

sentences.english: In the prologue, the first thing you do is save the link register.
sentences.chinese: 在序言中，所要做的第一件事情是保存鏈接寄存器。

sentences.english: A logical address consists of a segment register specifier and offset.
sentences.chinese: 一個邏輯地址包含了段寄存器的說明符及偏移量。

sentences.english: This register defines the state of the processor.
sentences.chinese: 此寄存器將定義處理器的狀態。

sentences.english: The data type for the expected response values from a register range.
sentences.chinese: 來自一個寄存器範圍的預期響應值的數據類型。

sentences.english: The default value of this register is an empty string.
sentences.chinese: 這個寄存器的默認值是一個空字符串。

sentences.english: What this program is doing is calculating the registers being used.
sentences.chinese: 這個程序執行的操作是計算正在使用的寄存器。

sentences.english: In an emulated platform, the registers and memory that represent the device are emulated.
sentences.chinese: 在仿真平臺中，代表設備的寄存器和內存將被仿真。

sentences.english: Do the MMX registers always exist in modern processors?
sentences.chinese: 做MMX寄存器總是在現代處理器的存在嗎？

definition: to address/to search for address/to input data into memory
(computing) actual parameter/argument/abbr. for 實際參數|实际参数[shi2 ji4 can1 shu4]
